items.value: GET <color=yellow>2500</color> COINS by watching the video..
Thank you for watching. Your <color=yellow>2500</color> coins уже у вас.
New documents will not arrive within 20 seconds.
Within 20 seconds, all documents become ready in one click.
Sign the document with your finger.
Drag and drop the document to the desired area.
You're new, right? I was sent to explain what's going on here.
Your task is to sign documents in a certain amount of time.
If you fail to sign the document - you will lose one health point.
And if you lose all your health points, you will be...
How are the first days? Not so hard?
You can forget about it. A new decree has come. Now we need to fill new forms.
Still with us? There is bad news for you.
You will have to stamp on green documents, otherwise you will be FIRED.
Incorrectly executed document went into circulation. It is without the red mark, which is on ordinary documents.
Throw away such documents. If you do not do this, you will be fired. Oh yes, do not throw away normal documents.
I am surprised. You still haven't escaped from our Company. There is news for you...
The boss has increased our work time, again.
